thread.title: Patrice Evra wishes Park Ji-Sung happy birthday | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Patrice Evra wishes Park Ji-Sung happy birthday | Daily Mail Online

author: Jonathan Spencer For Mailonline
title: Patrice Evra wishes Park Ji-Sung happy birthday | Daily Mail Online
text: 'I love you FOREVRA': Patrice Evra wishes ex-Manchester United team-mate Park Ji-Sung happy birthday as he makes funny Rush Hour reference Patrice Evra took to Instagram to wish Park Ji-Sung a happy 36th birthday In his social media message, the French defender wrote: 'I love you FOREVRA' Evra super-imposed their heads onto Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan as he posted a photo of the Rush Hour 3 cover The pair spent six years together at Manchester United, forming a strong bond Published: 14:23 GMT, 25 February 2017 | Updated: 14:26 GMT, 25 February 2017 55 shares
